Title: Requires the department of health to provide at least one site in each county of the state which offers COVID-19 vaccinations
Summary: Requires the department of health to provide at least one site in each county of the state which offers COVID-19 vaccinations and to establish an enrollment portal which shall enable residents to be notified once they become eligible for the vaccine.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to requiring the department of health to provide at least one site in each county of the state which offers COVID-19 vaccinations
